code: import{LOGIN_SUCCESS,LOGIN_FAILURE,LOGOUT_SUCCESS}from"../actions/auth.js";var authenticated=localStorage.getItem('authenticated');export default function auth(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{isFetching:false,isAuthenticated:authenticated};var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case LOGIN_SUCCESS:return Object.assign({},state,{isFetching:false,isAuthenticated:true,errorMessage:''});case LOGIN_FAILURE:return Object.assign({},state,{isFetching:false,isAuthenticated:false,errorMessage:action.payload});case LOGOUT_SUCCESS:return Object.assign({},state,{isAuthenticated:false});default:return state;}}
